plot: Over 30,000 Spanish children were deported during the civil war. They were sent to Belgium, Russia, UK, Mexico, France - and then forgotten.
title: Niños
plot_es: Over 30,000 Spanish children were deported during the civil war. They were sent to Belgium, Russia, UK, Mexico, France - and then forgotten.
plot_en: Over 30,000 Spanish children were deported during the civil war. They were sent to Belgium, Russia, UK, Mexico, France - and then forgotten.
